revised_title: Meteorological Observations and Weather Patterns Over 14 Years
tldr: This article presents 14 years of meteorological observations, including mean heights of the barometer, thermometer, and quantity of rain in each month. The author, George Lynn, also provides some remarks on weather patterns and offers a few cursory notes on his findings. The data collected can be used for further analysis and comparison by the Royal Society and other experts in the field.
